text: Wherever the spirit was to go, they went; there was the spirit to go: and the wheels were lifted up beside them; for the spirit of the living creature was in the wheels.

name: Ezekiel 1:21
text: When those went, these went; and when those stood, these stood; and when those were lifted up from the earth, the wheels were lifted up beside them: for the spirit of the living creature was in the wheels.

name: Ezekiel 1:22
text: Over the head of the living creature there was the likeness of an expanse, like the awesome crystal to look on, stretched forth over their heads above.

name: Ezekiel 1:23
text: Under the expanse were their wings straight, the one toward the other: each one had two which covered on this side, and every one had two which covered on that side, their bodies.

name: Ezekiel 1:24
text: When they went, I heard the noise of their wings like the noise of great waters, like the voice of the Almighty, a noise of tumult like the noise of an army: when they stood, they let down their wings.

name: Ezekiel 1:25
text: There was a voice above the expanse that was over their heads: when they stood, they let down their wings.

name: Ezekiel 1:26
text: Above the expanse that was over their heads was the likeness of a throne, as the appearance of a sapphire stone; and on the likeness of the throne was a likeness as the appearance of a man on it above.

name: Ezekiel 1:27
text: I saw as it were glowing metal, as the appearance of fire within it all around, from the appearance of his waist and upward; and from the appearance of his waist and downward I saw as it were the appearance of fire, and there was brightness around him.

name: Ezekiel 1:28
text: As the appearance of the rainbow that is in the cloud in the day of rain, so was the appearance of the brightness all around. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of Yahweh. When I saw it, I fell on my face, and I heard a voice of one that spoke.

name: Ezekiel 2:1
text: He said to me, Son of man, stand on your feet, and I will speak with you.

name: Ezekiel 2:2
text: The Spirit entered into me when he spoke to me, and set me on my feet; and I heard him who spoke to me.

name: Ezekiel 2:3
text: He said to me, Son of man, I send you to the children of Israel, to a nation of rebels who have rebelled against me. They and their fathers have transgressed against me even to this very day.

name: Ezekiel 2:4
text: The children are impudent and stiff-hearted: I am sending you to them; and you shall tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 2:5
text: They, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear, (for they are a rebellious house), yet shall know that there has been a prophet among them.

name: Ezekiel 2:6
text: You, son of man, don"t be afraid of them, neither be afraid of their words, though briers and thorns are with you, and you do dwell among scorpions: don"t be afraid of their words, nor be dismayed at their looks, though they are a rebellious house.

name: Ezekiel 2:7
text: You shall speak my words to them, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear; for they are most rebellious.

name: Ezekiel 2:8
text: But you, son of man, hear what I tell you; don"t be rebellious like that rebellious house: open your mouth, and eat that which I give you.

name: Ezekiel 2:9
text: When I looked, behold, a hand was put forth to me; and, behold, a scroll of a book was therein;

name: Ezekiel 2:10
text: He spread it before me: and it was written within and without; and there were written therein lamentations, and mourning, and woe.

name: Ezekiel 3:1
text: He said to me, Son of man, eat that which you find. Eat this scroll, and go, speak to the house of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 3:2
text: So I opened my mouth, and he caused me to eat the scroll.

name: Ezekiel 3:3
text: He said to me, Son of man, cause your belly to eat, and fill your bowels with this scroll that I give you. Then I ate it; and it was as sweet as honey in my mouth.

name: Ezekiel 3:4
text: He said to me, Son of man, go to the house of Israel, and speak my words to them.

name: Ezekiel 3:5
text: For you are not sent to a people of a strange speech and of a hard language, but to the house of Israel;

name: Ezekiel 3:6
text: not to many peoples of a strange speech and of a hard language, whose words you can not understand. Surely, if I sent you to them, they would listen to you.

name: Ezekiel 3:7
text: But the house of Israel will not listen to you; for they will not listen to me: for all the house of Israel are obstinate and hard-hearted.

name: Ezekiel 3:8
text: Behold, I have made your face hard against their faces, and your forehead hard against their foreheads.

name: Ezekiel 3:9
text: As an adamant harder than flint have I made your forehead: don"t be afraid of them, neither be dismayed at their looks, though they are a rebellious house.

name: Ezekiel 3:10
text: Moreover he said to me, Son of man, all my words that I shall speak to you receive in your heart, and hear with your ears.

name: Ezekiel 3:11
text: Go to them of the captivity, to the children of your people, and speak to them, and tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh; whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear.

name: Ezekiel 3:12
text: Then the Spirit lifted me up, and I heard behind me the voice of a great rushing, saying, Blessed be the glory of Yahweh from his place.

name: Ezekiel 3:13
text: I heard the noise of the wings of the living creatures as they touched one another, and the noise of the wheels beside them, even the noise of a great rushing.

name: Ezekiel 3:14
text: So the Spirit lifted me up, and took me away; and I went in bitterness, in the heat of my spirit; and the hand of Yahweh was strong on me.

name: Ezekiel 3:15
text: Then I came to them of the captivity at Tel Aviv, that lived by the river Chebar, and to where they lived; and I sat there overwhelmed among them seven days.

name: Ezekiel 3:16
text: It happened at the end of seven days, that the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 3:17
text: Son of man, I have made you a watchman to the house of Israel: therefore hear the word from my mouth, and give them warning from me.

name: Ezekiel 3:18
text: When I tell the wicked, You shall surely die; and you give him no warning, nor speak to warn the wicked from his wicked way, to save his life; the same wicked man shall die in his iniquity; but his blood will I require at your hand.

name: Ezekiel 3:19
text: Yet if you warn the wicked, and he doesn"t turn from his wickedness, nor from his wicked way, he shall die in his iniquity; but you have delivered your soul.

name: Ezekiel 3:20
text: Again, when a righteous man does turn from his righteousness, and commit iniquity, and I lay a stumbling block before him, he shall die: because you have not given him warning, he shall die in his sin, and his righteous deeds which he has done shall not be remembered; but his blood will I require at your hand.

name: Ezekiel 3:21
text: Nevertheless if you warn the righteous man, that the righteous not sin, and he does not sin, he shall surely live, because he took warning; and you have delivered your soul.

name: Ezekiel 3:22
text: The hand of Yahweh was there on me; and he said to me, Arise, go forth into the plain, and I will there talk with you.

name: Ezekiel 3:23
text: Then I arose, and went forth into the plain: and behold, the glory of Yahweh stood there, as the glory which I saw by the river Chebar; and I fell on my face.

name: Ezekiel 3:24
text: Then the Spirit entered into me, and set me on my feet; and he spoke with me, and said to me, Go, shut yourself inside your house.

name: Ezekiel 3:25
text: But you, son of man, behold, they shall lay bands on you, and shall bind you with them, and you shall not go out among them:

name: Ezekiel 3:26
text: and I will make your tongue stick to the roof of your mouth, that you shall be mute, and shall not be to them a reprover; for they are a rebellious house.

name: Ezekiel 3:27
text: But when I speak with you, I will open your mouth, and you shall tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: He who hears, let him hear; and he who forbears, let him forbear: for they are a rebellious house.

name: Ezekiel 4:1
text: You also, son of man, take a tile, and lay it before yourself, and portray on it a city, even Jerusalem:

name: Ezekiel 4:2
text: and lay siege against it, and build forts against it, and cast up a mound against it; set camps also against it, and plant battering rams against it all around.

name: Ezekiel 4:3
text: Take for yourself an iron pan, and set it for a wall of iron between you and the city: and set your face toward it, and it shall be besieged, and you shall lay siege against it. This shall be a sign to the house of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 4:4
text: Moreover lie on your left side, and lay the iniquity of the house of Israel on it; according to the number of the days that you shall lie on it, you shall bear their iniquity.

name: Ezekiel 4:5
text: For I have appointed the years of their iniquity to be to you a number of days, even three hundred ninety days: so you shall bear the iniquity of the house of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 4:6
text: Again, when you have accomplished these, you shall lie on your right side, and shall bear the iniquity of the house of Judah: forty days, each day for a year, have I appointed it to you.

name: Ezekiel 4:7
text: You shall set your face toward the siege of Jerusalem, with your arm uncovered; and you shall prophesy against it.

name: Ezekiel 4:8
text: Behold, I lay bands on you, and you shall not turn you from one side to the other, until you have accomplished the days of your siege.

name: Ezekiel 4:9
text: Take for yourself also wheat, and barley, and beans, and lentils, and millet, and spelt, and put them in one vessel, and make bread of it; according to the number of the days that you shall lie on your side, even three hundred ninety days, you shall eat of it.

name: Ezekiel 4:10
text: Your food which you shall eat shall be by weight, twenty shekels a day: from time to time you shall eat it.

name: Ezekiel 4:11
text: You shall drink water by measure, the sixth part of a hin: from time to time you shall drink.

name: Ezekiel 4:12
text: You shall eat it as barley cakes, and you shall bake it in their sight with dung that comes out of man.

name: Ezekiel 4:13
text: Yahweh said, Even thus shall the children of Israel eat their bread unclean, among the nations where I will drive them.

name: Ezekiel 4:14
text: Then I said, Ah Lord Yahweh! behold, my soul has not been polluted; for from my youth up even until now have I not eaten of that which dies of itself, or is torn of animals; neither came there abominable flesh into my mouth.

name: Ezekiel 4:15
text: Then he said to me, Behold, I have given you cow"s dung for man"s dung, and you shall prepare your bread thereon.

name: Ezekiel 4:16
text: Moreover he said to me, Son of man, behold, I will break the staff of bread in Jerusalem: and they shall eat bread by weight, and with fearfulness; and they shall drink water by measure, and in dismay:

name: Ezekiel 4:17
text: that they may want bread and water, and be dismayed one with another, and pine away in their iniquity.

name: Ezekiel 5:1
text: You, son of man, take a sharp sword; You shall take it as a barber"s razor to you, and shall cause it to pass on your head and on your beard: then take balances to weigh, and divide the hair.

name: Ezekiel 5:2
text: A third part you shall burn in the fire in the midst of the city, when the days of the siege are fulfilled; and you shall take a third part, and strike with the sword around it; and a third part you shall scatter to the wind, and I will draw out a sword after them.

name: Ezekiel 5:3
text: You shall take of it a few in number, and bind them in your skirts.

name: Ezekiel 5:4
text: Of these again you shall take, and cast them into the midst of the fire, and burn them in the fire; from it shall a fire come forth into all the house of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 5:5
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: This is Jerusalem; I have set her in the midst of the nations, and countries are around her.

name: Ezekiel 5:6
text: She has rebelled against my ordinances in doing wickedness more than the nations, and against my statutes more than the countries that are around her; for they have rejected my ordinances, and as for my statutes, they have not walked in them.

name: Ezekiel 5:7
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because you are turbulent more than the nations that are around you, and have not walked in my statutes, neither have kept my ordinances, neither have done after the ordinances of the nations that are around you;

name: Ezekiel 5:8
text: therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I, even I, am against you; and I will execute judgments in the midst of you in the sight of the nations.

name: Ezekiel 5:9
text: I will do in you that which I have not done, and whereunto I will not do any more the like, because of all your abominations.

name: Ezekiel 5:10
text: Therefore the fathers shall eat the sons in the midst of you, and the sons shall eat their fathers; and I will execute judgments on you; and the whole remnant of you will I scatter to all the winds.

name: Ezekiel 5:11
text: Therefore, as I live, says the Lord Yahweh, surely, because you have defiled my sanctuary with all your detestable things, and with all your abominations, therefore will I also diminish you; neither shall my eye spare, and I also will have no pity.

name: Ezekiel 5:12
text: A third part of you shall die with the pestilence, and with famine shall they be consumed in the midst of you; and a third part shall fall by the sword around you; and a third part I will scatter to all the winds, and will draw out a sword after them.

name: Ezekiel 5:13
text: Thus shall my anger be accomplished, and I will cause my wrath toward them to rest, and I shall be comforted; and they shall know that I, Yahweh, have spoken in my zeal, when I have accomplished my wrath on them.

name: Ezekiel 5:14
text: Moreover I will make you a desolation and a reproach among the nations that are around you, in the sight of all that pass by.

name: Ezekiel 5:15
text: So it shall be a reproach and a taunt, an instruction and an astonishment, to the nations that are around you, when I shall execute judgments on you in anger and in wrath, and in wrathful rebukes; (I, Yahweh, have spoken it;)

name: Ezekiel 5:16
text: when I shall send on them the evil arrows of famine, that are for destruction, which I will send to destroy you: and I will increase the famine on you, and will break your staff of bread;

name: Ezekiel 5:17
text: and I will send on you famine and evil animals, and they shall bereave you; and pestilence and blood shall pass through you; and I will bring the sword on you: I, Yahweh, have spoken it.

name: Ezekiel 6:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 6:2
text: Son of man, set your face toward the mountains of Israel, and prophesy to them,

name: Ezekiel 6:3
text: and say, You mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord Yahweh: Thus says the Lord Yahweh to the mountains and to the hills, to the watercourses and to the valleys: Behold, I, even I, will bring a sword on you, and I will destroy your high places.

name: Ezekiel 6:4
text: Your altars shall become desolate, and your incense altars shall be broken; and I will cast down your slain men before your idols.

name: Ezekiel 6:5
text: I will lay the dead bodies of the children of Israel before their idols; and I will scatter your bones around your altars.

name: Ezekiel 6:6
text: In all your dwelling places the cities shall be laid waste, and the high places shall be desolate; that your altars may be laid waste and made desolate, and your idols may be broken and cease, and your incense altars may be cut down, and your works may be abolished.

name: Ezekiel 6:7
text: The slain shall fall in the midst of you, and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 6:8
text: Yet will I leave a remnant, in that you shall have some that escape the sword among the nations, when you shall be scattered through the countries.

name: Ezekiel 6:9
text: Those of you that escape shall remember me among the nations where they shall be carried captive, how that I have been broken with their lewd heart, which has departed from me, and with their eyes, which play the prostitute after their idols: and they shall loathe themselves in their own sight for the evils which they have committed in all their abominations.

name: Ezekiel 6:10
text: They shall know that I am Yahweh: I have not said in vain that I would do this evil to them.

name: Ezekiel 6:11
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Strike with your hand, and stamp with your foot, and say, Alas! because of all the evil abominations of the house of Israel; for they shall fall by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence.

name: Ezekiel 6:12
text: He who is far off shall die of the pestilence; and he who is near shall fall by the sword; and he who remains and is besieged shall die by the famine: thus will I accomplish my wrath on them.

name: Ezekiel 6:13
text: You shall know that I am Yahweh, when their slain men shall be among their idols around their altars, on every high hill, on all the tops of the mountains, and under every green tree, and under every thick oak, the places where they offered pleasant aroma to all their idols.

name: Ezekiel 6:14
text: I will stretch out my hand on them, and make the land desolate and waste, from the wilderness toward Diblah, throughout all their habitations: and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 7:1
text: Moreover the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 7:2
text: You, son of man, thus says the Lord Yahweh to the land of Israel, An end: the end has come on the four corners of the land.

name: Ezekiel 7:3
text: Now is the end on you, and I will send my anger on you, and will judge you according to your ways; and I will bring on you all your abominations.

name: Ezekiel 7:4
text: My eye shall not spare you, neither will I have pity; but I will bring your ways on you, and your abominations shall be in the midst of you: and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 7:5
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: An evil, an only evil; behold, it comes.

name: Ezekiel 7:6
text: An end has come, the end has come; it awakes against you; behold, it comes.

name: Ezekiel 7:7
text: Your doom has come to you, inhabitant of the land: the time has come, the day is near, a day of tumult, and not of joyful shouting, on the mountains.

name: Ezekiel 7:8
text: Now will I shortly pour out my wrath on you, and accomplish my anger against you, and will judge you according to your ways; and I will bring on you all your abominations.

name: Ezekiel 7:9
text: My eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity: I will bring on you according to your ways; and your abominations shall be in the midst of you; and you shall know that I, Yahweh, do strike.

name: Ezekiel 7:10
text: Behold, the day, behold, it comes: your doom is gone forth; the rod has blossomed, pride has budded.

name: Ezekiel 7:11
text: Violence has risen up into a rod of wickedness. None of them shall remain, nor of their multitude, nor of their wealth. There shall be nothing of value among them.

name: Ezekiel 7:12
text: The time has come, the day draws near: don"t let the buyer rejoice, nor the seller mourn; for wrath is on all its multitude.

name: Ezekiel 7:13
text: For the seller shall not return to that which is sold, although they be yet alive: for the vision is touching the whole multitude of it, none shall return; neither shall any strengthen himself in the iniquity of his life.

name: Ezekiel 7:14
text: They have blown the trumpet, and have made all ready; but none goes to the battle; for my wrath is on all its multitude.

name: Ezekiel 7:15
text: The sword is outside, and the pestilence and the famine within: he who is in the field shall die with the sword: and he who is in the city, famine and pestilence shall devour him.

name: Ezekiel 7:16
text: But those of those who escape shall escape, and shall be on the mountains like doves of the valleys, all of them moaning, every one in his iniquity.

name: Ezekiel 7:17
text: All hands shall be feeble, and all knees shall be weak as water.

name: Ezekiel 7:18
text: They shall also clothe themselves with sackcloth, and horror shall cover them; and shame shall be on all faces, and baldness on all their heads.

name: Ezekiel 7:19
text: They shall cast their silver in the streets, and their gold shall be as an unclean thing; their silver and their gold shall not be able to deliver them in the day of the wrath of Yahweh: they shall not satisfy their souls, neither fill their bowels; because it has been the stumbling block of their iniquity.

name: Ezekiel 7:20
text: As for the beauty of his ornament, he set it in majesty; but they made the images of their abominations and their detestable things therein: therefore have I made it to them as an unclean thing.

name: Ezekiel 7:21
text: I will give it into the hands of the strangers for a prey, and to the wicked of the earth for a spoil; and they shall profane it.

name: Ezekiel 7:22
text: My face will I turn also from them, and they shall profane my secret place; and robbers shall enter into it, and profane it.

name: Ezekiel 7:23
text: Make the chain; for the land is full of bloody crimes, and the city is full of violence.

name: Ezekiel 7:24
text: Therefore I will bring the worst of the nations, and they shall possess their houses: I will also make the pride of the strong to cease; and their holy places shall be profaned.

name: Ezekiel 7:25
text: Destruction comes; and they shall seek peace, and there shall be none.

name: Ezekiel 7:26
text: Mischief shall come on mischief, and rumor shall be on rumor; and they shall seek a vision of the prophet; but the law shall perish from the priest, and counsel from the elders.

name: Ezekiel 7:27
text: The king shall mourn, and the prince shall be clothed with desolation, and the hands of the people of the land shall be troubled: I will do to them after their way, and according to their own judgments will I judge them; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 8:1
text: It happened in the sixth year, in the sixth month, in the fifth day of the month, as I sat in my house, and the elders of Judah sat before me, that the hand of the Lord Yahweh fell there on me.

name: Ezekiel 8:2
text: Then I saw, and behold, a likeness as the appearance of fire; from the appearance of his waist and downward, fire; and from his waist and upward, as the appearance of brightness, as it were glowing metal.

name: Ezekiel 8:3
text: He put forth the form of a hand, and took me by a lock of my head; and the Spirit lifted me up between earth and the sky, and brought me in the visions of God to Jerusalem, to the door of the gate of the inner court that looks toward the north; where there was the seat of the image of jealousy, which provokes to jealousy.

name: Ezekiel 8:4
text: Behold, the glory of the God of Israel was there, according to the appearance that I saw in the plain.

name: Ezekiel 8:5
text: Then he said to me, Son of man, lift up your eyes now the way toward the north. So I lifted up my eyes the way toward the north, and see, northward of the gate of the altar this image of jealousy in the entry.

name: Ezekiel 8:6
text: He said to me, Son of man, do you see what they do? even the great abominations that the house of Israel do commit here, that I should go far off from my sanctuary? But you shall again see yet other great abominations.

name: Ezekiel 8:7
text: He brought me to the door of the court; and when I looked, behold, a hole in the wall.

name: Ezekiel 8:8
text: Then he said to me, Son of man, dig now in the wall: and when I had dug in the wall, behold, a door.

name: Ezekiel 8:9
text: He said to me, Go in, and see the wicked abominations that they do here.

name: Ezekiel 8:10
text: So I went in and saw; and see, every form of creeping things, and abominable animals, and all the idols of the house of Israel, portrayed around on the wall.

name: Ezekiel 8:11
text: There stood before them seventy men of the elders of the house of Israel; and in their midst stood Jaazaniah the son of Shaphan, every man with his censer in his hand; and the odor of the cloud of incense went up.

name: Ezekiel 8:12
text: Then he said to me, Son of man, have you seen what the elders of the house of Israel do in the dark, every man in his rooms of imagery? for they say, Yahweh doesn"t see us; Yahweh has forsaken the land.

name: Ezekiel 8:13
text: He said also to me, You shall again see yet other great abominations which they do.

name: Ezekiel 8:14
text: Then he brought me to the door of the gate of Yahweh"s house which was toward the north; and see, there sat the women weeping for Tammuz.

name: Ezekiel 8:15
text: Then he said to me, Have you seen this, son of man? You shall again see yet greater abominations than these.

name: Ezekiel 8:16
text: He brought me into the inner court of Yahweh"s house; and see, at the door of the temple of Yahweh, between the porch and the altar, were about twenty-five men, with their backs toward the temple of Yahweh, and their faces toward the east; and they were worshipping the sun toward the east.

name: Ezekiel 8:17
text: Then he said to me, Have you seen this, son of man? Is it a light thing to the house of Judah that they commit the abominations which they commit here? for they have filled the land with violence, and have turned again to provoke me to anger: and behold, they put the branch to their nose.

name: Ezekiel 8:18
text: Therefore will I also deal in wrath; my eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity; and though they cry in my ears with a loud voice, yet will I not hear them.

name: Ezekiel 9:1
text: Then he cried in my ears with a loud voice, saying, Cause those who are in charge of the city to draw near, every man with his destroying weapon in his hand.

name: Ezekiel 9:2
text: Behold, six men came from the way of the upper gate, which lies toward the north, every man with his slaughter weapon in his hand; and one man in their midst clothed in linen, with a writer"s inkhorn by his side. They went in, and stood beside the bronze altar.

name: Ezekiel 9:3
text: The glory of the God of Israel was gone up from the cherub, whereupon it was, to the threshold of the house: and he called to the man clothed in linen, who had the writer"s inkhorn by his side.

name: Ezekiel 9:4
text: Yahweh said to him, Go through the midst of the city, through the midst of Jerusalem, and set a mark on the foreheads of the men that sigh and that cry over all the abominations that are done in its midst.

name: Ezekiel 9:5
text: To the others he said in my hearing, Go through the city after him, and strike: don"t let your eye spare, neither have pity;

name: Ezekiel 9:6
text: kill utterly the old man, the young man and the virgin, and little children and women; but don"t come near any man on whom is the mark: and begin at my sanctuary. Then they began at the old men that were before the house.

name: Ezekiel 9:7
text: He said to them, Defile the house, and fill the courts with the slain. Go forth! They went forth, and struck in the city.

name: Ezekiel 9:8
text: It happened, while they were smiting, and I was left, that I fell on my face, and cried, and said, Ah Lord Yahweh! will you destroy all the residue of Israel in your pouring out of your wrath on Jerusalem?

name: Ezekiel 9:9
text: Then he said to me, The iniquity of the house of Israel and Judah is exceedingly great, and the land is full of blood, and the city full of perversion: for they say, Yahweh has forsaken the land, and Yahweh doesn"t see.

name: Ezekiel 9:10
text: As for me also, my eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity, but I will bring their way on their head.

name: Ezekiel 9:11
text: Behold, the man clothed in linen, who had the inkhorn by his side, reported the matter, saying, I have done as you have commanded me.

name: Ezekiel 10:1
text: Then I looked, and see, in the expanse that was over the head of the cherubim there appeared above them as it were a sapphire stone, as the appearance of the likeness of a throne.

name: Ezekiel 10:2
text: He spoke to the man clothed in linen, and said, Go in between the whirling wheels, even under the cherub, and fill both your hands with coals of fire from between the cherubim, and scatter them over the city. He went in as I watched.

name: Ezekiel 10:3
text: Now the cherubim stood on the right side of the house, when the man went in; and the cloud filled the inner court.

name: Ezekiel 10:4
text: The glory of Yahweh mounted up from the cherub, and stood over the threshold of the house; and the house was filled with the cloud, and the court was full of the brightness of Yahweh"s glory.

name: Ezekiel 10:5
text: The sound of the wings of the cherubim was heard even to the outer court, as the voice of God Almighty when he speaks.

name: Ezekiel 10:6
text: It came to pass, when he commanded the man clothed in linen, saying, Take fire from between the whirling wheels, from between the cherubim, that he went in, and stood beside a wheel.

name: Ezekiel 10:7
text: The cherub stretched forth his hand from between the cherubim to the fire that was between the cherubim, and took of it, and put it into the hands of him who was clothed in linen, who took it and went out.

name: Ezekiel 10:8
text: There appeared in the cherubim the form of a man"s hand under their wings.

name: Ezekiel 10:9
text: I looked, and behold, four wheels beside the cherubim, one wheel beside one cherub, and another wheel beside another cherub; and the appearance of the wheels was like a beryl stone.

name: Ezekiel 10:10
text: As for their appearance, the four of them had one likeness, like a wheel within a wheel.

name: Ezekiel 10:11
text: When they went, they went in their four directions: they didn"t turn as they went, but to the place where the head looked they followed it; they didn"t turn as they went.

name: Ezekiel 10:12
text: Their whole body, and their backs, and their hands, and their wings, and the wheels, were full of eyes all around, even the wheels that the four of them had.

name: Ezekiel 10:13
text: As for the wheels, they were called in my hearing, the whirling wheels.

name: Ezekiel 10:14
text: Every one had four faces: the first face was the face of the cherub, and the second face was the face of a man, and the third face the face of a lion, and the fourth the face of an eagle.

name: Ezekiel 10:15
text: The cherubim mounted up: this is the living creature that I saw by the river Chebar.

name: Ezekiel 10:16
text: When the cherubim went, the wheels went beside them; and when the cherubim lifted up their wings to mount up from the earth, the wheels also didn"t turn from beside them.

name: Ezekiel 10:17
text: When they stood, these stood; and when they mounted up, these mounted up with them: for the spirit of the living creature was in them.

name: Ezekiel 10:18
text: The glory of Yahweh went forth from over the threshold of the house, and stood over the cherubim.

name: Ezekiel 10:19
text: The cherubim lifted up their wings, and mounted up from the earth in my sight when they went forth, and the wheels beside them: and they stood at the door of the east gate of Yahweh"s house; and the glory of the God of Israel was over them above.

name: Ezekiel 10:20
text: This is the living creature that I saw under the God of Israel by the river Chebar; and I knew that they were cherubim.

name: Ezekiel 10:21
text: Every one had four faces, and every one four wings; and the likeness of the hands of a man was under their wings.

name: Ezekiel 10:22
text: As for the likeness of their faces, they were the faces which I saw by the river Chebar, their appearances and themselves; they went every one straight forward.

name: Ezekiel 11:1
text: Moreover the Spirit lifted me up, and brought me to the east gate of Yahweh"s house, which looks eastward: and see, at the door of the gate twenty-five men; and I saw in their midst Jaazaniah the son of Azzur, and Pelatiah the son of Benaiah, princes of the people.

name: Ezekiel 11:2
text: He said to me, Son of man, these are the men who devise iniquity, and who give wicked counsel in this city;

name: Ezekiel 11:3
text: who say, The time is not near to build houses: this is the caldron, and we are the meat.

name: Ezekiel 11:4
text: Therefore prophesy against them, prophesy, son of man.

name: Ezekiel 11:5
text: The Spirit of Yahweh fell on me, and he said to me, Speak, Thus says Yahweh: Thus you have said, house of Israel; for I know the things that come into your mind.

name: Ezekiel 11:6
text: You have multiplied your slain in this city, and you have filled its streets with the slain.

name: Ezekiel 11:7
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Your slain whom you have laid in its midst, they are the meat, and this is the caldron; but you shall be brought out of its midst.

name: Ezekiel 11:8
text: You have feared the sword; and I will bring the sword on you, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 11:9
text: I will bring you forth out of its midst, and deliver you into the hands of strangers, and will execute judgments among you.

name: Ezekiel 11:10
text: You shall fall by the sword; I will judge you in the border of Israel; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 11:11
text: This shall not be your caldron, neither shall you be the meat in its midst; I will judge you in the border of Israel;

name: Ezekiel 11:12
text: and you shall know that I am Yahweh: for you have not walked in my statutes, neither have you executed my ordinances, but have done after the ordinances of the nations that are around you.

name: Ezekiel 11:13
text: It happened, when I prophesied, that Pelatiah the son of Benaiah died. Then fell I down on my face, and cried with a loud voice, and said, Ah Lord Yahweh! will you make a full end of the remnant of Israel?

name: Ezekiel 11:14
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 11:15
text: Son of man, your brothers, even your brothers, the men of your relatives, and all the house of Israel, all of them, to whom the inhabitants of Jerusalem have said, Go far away from Yahweh. This land has been given to us for a possession.

name: Ezekiel 11:16
text: Therefore say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Whereas I have removed them far off among the nations, and whereas I have scattered them among the countries, yet will I be to them a sanctuary for a little while in the countries where they have come.

name: Ezekiel 11:17
text: Therefore say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will gather you from the peoples, and assemble you out of the countries where you have been scattered, and I will give you the land of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 11:18
text: They shall come there, and they shall take away all the detestable things of it and all its abominations from there.

name: Ezekiel 11:19
text: I will give them one heart, and I will put a new spirit within you; and I will take the stony heart out of their flesh, and will give them a heart of flesh;

name: Ezekiel 11:20
text: that they may walk in my statutes, and keep my ordinances, and do them: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God.

name: Ezekiel 11:21
text: But as for them whose heart walks after the heart of their detestable things and their abominations, I will bring their way on their own heads, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 11:22
text: Then the cherubim lifted up their wings, and the wheels were beside them; and the glory of the God of Israel was over them above.

name: Ezekiel 11:23
text: The glory of Yahweh went up from the midst of the city, and stood on the mountain which is on the east side of the city.

name: Ezekiel 11:24
text: The Spirit lifted me up, and brought me in the vision by the Spirit of God into Chaldea, to them of the captivity. So the vision that I had seen went up from me.

name: Ezekiel 11:25
text: Then I spoke to them of the captivity all the things that Yahweh had shown me.

name: Ezekiel 12:1
text: The word of Yahweh also came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 12:2
text: Son of man, you dwell in the midst of the rebellious house, who have eyes to see, and don"t see, who have ears to hear, and don"t hear; for they are a rebellious house.

name: Ezekiel 12:3
text: Therefore, you son of man, prepare your stuff for moving, and move by day in their sight; and you shall move from your place to another place in their sight: it may be they will consider, though they are a rebellious house.

name: Ezekiel 12:4
text: You shall bring forth your stuff by day in their sight, as stuff for moving; and you shall go forth yourself at even in their sight, as when men go forth into exile.

name: Ezekiel 12:5
text: Dig through the wall in their sight, and carry your stuff out that way.

name: Ezekiel 12:6
text: In their sight you shall bear it on your shoulder, and carry it forth in the dark; you shall cover your face, so that you don"t see the land: for I have set you for a sign to the house of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 12:7
text: I did so as I was commanded: I brought forth my stuff by day, as stuff for removing, and in the even I dug through the wall with my hand; I brought it forth in the dark, and bore it on my shoulder in their sight.

name: Ezekiel 12:8
text: In the morning came the word of Yahweh to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 12:9
text: Son of man, has not the house of Israel, the rebellious house, said to you, What are you doing?

name: Ezekiel 12:10
text: Say to them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: This burden concerns the prince in Jerusalem, and all the house of Israel among whom they are.

name: Ezekiel 12:11
text: Say, I am your sign: like as I have done, so shall it be done to them; they shall go into exile, into captivity.

name: Ezekiel 12:12
text: The prince who is among them shall bear on his shoulder in the dark, and shall go forth: they shall dig through the wall to carry out thereby: he shall cover his face, because he shall not see the land with his eyes.

name: Ezekiel 12:13
text: My net also will I spread on him, and he shall be taken in my snare; and I will bring him to Babylon to the land of the Chaldeans; yet shall he not see it, though he shall die there.

name: Ezekiel 12:14
text: I will scatter toward every wind all who are around him to help him, and all his bands; and I will draw out the sword after them.

name: Ezekiel 12:15
text: They shall know that I am Yahweh, when I shall disperse them among the nations, and scatter them through the countries.

name: Ezekiel 12:16
text: But I will leave a few men of them from the sword, from the famine, and from the pestilence; that they may declare all their abominations among the nations where they come; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 12:17
text: Moreover the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 12:18
text: Son of man, eat your bread with quaking, and drink your water with trembling and with fearfulness;

name: Ezekiel 12:19
text: and tell the people of the land, Thus says the Lord Yahweh concerning the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and the land of Israel: They shall eat their bread with fearfulness, and drink their water in dismay, that her land may be desolate, and all that is therein, because of the violence of all those who dwell therein.

name: Ezekiel 12:20
text: The cities that are inhabited shall be laid waste, and the land shall be a desolation; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 12:21
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 12:22
text: Son of man, what is this proverb that you have in the land of Israel, saying, The days are prolonged, and every vision fails?

name: Ezekiel 12:23
text: Tell them therefore, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will make this proverb to cease, and they shall no more use it as a proverb in Israel; but tell them, The days are at hand, and the fulfillment of every vision.

name: Ezekiel 12:24
text: For there shall be no more any false vision nor flattering divination within the house of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 12:25
text: For I am Yahweh; I will speak, and the word that I shall speak shall be performed; it shall be no more deferred: for in your days, rebellious house, will I speak the word, and will perform it, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 12:26
text: Again the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 12:27
text: Son of man, behold, they of the house of Israel say, The vision that he sees is for many day to come, and he prophesies of times that are far off.

name: Ezekiel 12:28
text: Therefore tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: None of my words shall be deferred any more, but the word which I shall speak shall be performed, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 13:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 13:2
text: Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel who prophesy, and say to those who prophesy out of their own heart, Hear the word of Yahweh:

name: Ezekiel 13:3
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh, Woe to the foolish prophets, who follow their own spirit, and have seen nothing!

name: Ezekiel 13:4
text: Israel, your prophets have been like foxes in the waste places.

name: Ezekiel 13:5
text: You have not gone up into the gaps, neither built up the wall for the house of Israel, to stand in the battle in the day of Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 13:6
text: They have seen falsehood and lying divination, who say, Yahweh says; but Yahweh has not sent them: and they have made men to hope that the word would be confirmed.

name: Ezekiel 13:7
text: Haven"t you seen a false vision, and haven"t you spoken a lying divination, in that you say, Yahweh says; but I have not spoken?

name: Ezekiel 13:8
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because you have spoken falsehood, and seen lies, therefore, behold, I am against you, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 13:9
text: My hand shall be against the prophets who see false visions, and who divine lies: they shall not be in the council of my people, neither shall they be written in the writing of the house of Israel, neither shall they enter into the land of Israel; and you shall know that I am the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 13:10
text: Because, even because they have seduced my people, saying, Peace; and there is no peace; and when one builds up a wall, behold, they plaster it with whitewash:

name: Ezekiel 13:11
text: tell those who plaster it with whitewash, that it shall fall: there shall be an overflowing shower; and you, great hailstones, shall fall; and a stormy wind shall tear it.

name: Ezekiel 13:12
text: Behold, when the wall has fallen, shall it not be said to you, Where is the plaster with which you have plastered it?

name: Ezekiel 13:13
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will even tear it with a stormy wind in my wrath; and there shall be an overflowing shower in my anger, and great hailstones in wrath to consume it.

name: Ezekiel 13:14
text: So will I break down the wall that you have plastered with whitewash, and bring it down to the ground, so that its foundation shall be uncovered; and it shall fall, and you shall be consumed in its midst: and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 13:15
text: Thus will I accomplish my wrath on the wall, and on those who have plastered it with whitewash; and I will tell you, The wall is no more, neither those who plastered it;

name: Ezekiel 13:16
text: to wit, the prophets of Israel who prophesy concerning Jerusalem, and who see visions of peace for her, and there is no peace, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 13:17
text: You, son of man, set your face against the daughters of your people, who prophesy out of their own heart; and prophesy against them,

name: Ezekiel 13:18
text: and say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Woe to the women who sew pillows on all elbows, and make kerchiefs for the head of persons of every stature to hunt souls! Will you hunt the souls of my people, and save souls alive for yourselves?

name: Ezekiel 13:19
text: You have profaned me among my people for handfuls of barley and for pieces of bread, to kill the souls who should not die, and to save the souls alive who should not live, by your lying to my people who listen to lies.

name: Ezekiel 13:20
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I am against your pillows, with which you there hunt the souls to make them fly, and I will tear them from your arms; and I will let the souls go, even the souls whom you hunt to make them fly.

name: Ezekiel 13:21
text: Your kerchiefs also will I tear, and deliver my people out of your hand, and they shall be no more in your hand to be hunted; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 13:22
text: Because with lies you have grieved the heart of the righteous, whom I have not made sad; and strengthened the hands of the wicked, that he should not return from his wicked way, and be saved alive:

name: Ezekiel 13:23
text: Therefore you shall no more see false visions, nor practice divination. I will deliver my people out of your hand; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 14:1
text: Then came certain of the elders of Israel to me, and sat before me.

name: Ezekiel 14:2
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 14:3
text: Son of man, these men have taken their idols into their heart, and put the stumbling block of their iniquity before their face: should I be inquired of at all by them?

name: Ezekiel 14:4
text: Therefore speak to them, and tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Every man of the house of Israel who takes his idols into his heart, and puts the stumbling block of his iniquity before his face, and comes to the prophet; I Yahweh will answer him therein according to the multitude of his idols;

name: Ezekiel 14:5
text: that I may take the house of Israel in their own heart, because they are all estranged from me through their idols.

name: Ezekiel 14:6
text: Therefore tell the house of Israel, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Return, and turn yourselves from your idols; and turn away your faces from all your abominations.

name: Ezekiel 14:7
text: For everyone of the house of Israel, or of the strangers who live in Israel, who separates himself from me, and takes his idols into his heart, and puts the stumbling block of his iniquity before his face, and comes to the prophet to inquire for himself of me; I Yahweh will answer him by myself:

name: Ezekiel 14:8
text: and I will set my face against that man, and will make him an astonishment, for a sign and a proverb, and I will cut him off from the midst of my people; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 14:9
text: If the prophet is deceived and speak a word, I, Yahweh, have deceived that prophet, and I will stretch out my hand on him, and will destroy him from the midst of my people Israel.

name: Ezekiel 14:10
text: They shall bear their iniquity: the iniquity of the prophet shall be even as the iniquity of him who seeks him;

name: Ezekiel 14:11
text: that the house of Israel may go no more astray from me, neither defile themselves any more with all their transgressions; but that they may be my people, and I may be their God, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 14:12
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 14:13
text: Son of man, when a land sins against me by committing a trespass, and I stretch out my hand on it, and break the staff of its bread, and send famine on it, and cut off from it man and animal;

name: Ezekiel 14:14
text: though these three men, Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, they should deliver but their own souls by their righteousness, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 14:15
text: If I cause evil animals to pass through the land, and they ravage it, and it be made desolate, so that no man may pass through because of the animals;

name: Ezekiel 14:16
text: though these three men were in it, as I live, says the Lord Yahweh, they should deliver neither sons nor daughters; they only should be delivered, but the land should be desolate.

name: Ezekiel 14:17
text: Or if I bring a sword on that land, and say, Sword, go through the land; so that I cut off from it man and animal;

name: Ezekiel 14:18
text: though these three men were in it, as I live, says the Lord Yahweh, they should deliver neither sons nor daughters, but they only should be delivered themselves.

name: Ezekiel 14:19
text: Or if I send a pestilence into that land, and pour out my wrath on it in blood, to cut off from it man and animal;

name: Ezekiel 14:20
text: though Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, as I live, says the Lord Yahweh, they should deliver neither son nor daughter; they should but deliver their own souls by their righteousness.

name: Ezekiel 14:21
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: How much more when I send my four severe judgments on Jerusalem, the sword, and the famine, and the evil animals, and the pestilence, to cut off from it man and animal!

name: Ezekiel 14:22
text: Yet, behold, therein shall be left a remnant that shall be carried forth, both sons and daughters: behold, they shall come forth to you, and you shall see their way and their doings; and you shall be comforted concerning the evil that I have brought on Jerusalem, even concerning all that I have brought on it.

name: Ezekiel 14:23
text: They shall comfort you, when you see their way and their doings; and you shall know that I have not done without cause all that I have done in it, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 15:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 15:2
text: Son of man, what is the vine tree more than any tree, the vine-branch which is among the trees of the forest?

name: Ezekiel 15:3
text: Shall wood be taken of it to make any work? or will men take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?

name: Ezekiel 15:4
text: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire has devoured both its ends, and its midst is burned: is it profitable for any work?

name: Ezekiel 15:5
text: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less, when the fire has devoured it, and it is burned, shall it yet be meet for any work!

name: Ezekiel 15:6
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

name: Ezekiel 15:7
text: I will set my face against them; they shall go forth from the fire, but the fire shall devour them; and you shall know that I am Yahweh, when I set my face against them.

name: Ezekiel 15:8
text: I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 16:1
text: Again the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 16:2
text: Son of man, cause Jerusalem to know her abominations;

name: Ezekiel 16:3
text: and say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh to Jerusalem: Your birth and your birth is of the land of the Canaanite; the Amorite was your father, and your mother was a Hittite.

name: Ezekiel 16:4
text: As for your birth, in the day you were born your navel was not cut, neither were you washed in water to cleanse you; you weren"t salted at all, nor swaddled at all.

name: Ezekiel 16:5
text: No eye pitied you, to do any of these things to you, to have compassion on you; but you were cast out in the open field, for that your person was abhorred, in the day that you were born.

name: Ezekiel 16:6
text: When I passed by you, and saw you wallowing in your blood, I said to you, Though you are in your blood, live; yes, I said to you, Though you are in your blood, live.

name: Ezekiel 16:7
text: I caused you to multiply as that which grows in the field, and you increased and grew great, and you attained to excellent ornament; your breasts were fashioned, and your hair was grown; yet you were naked and bare.

name: Ezekiel 16:8
text: Now when I passed by you, and looked at you, behold, your time was the time of love; and I spread my skirt over you, and covered your nakedness: yes, I swore to you, and entered into a covenant with you, says the Lord Yahweh, and you became mine.

name: Ezekiel 16:9
text: Then washed I you with water; yes, I thoroughly washed away your blood from you, and I anointed you with oil.

name: Ezekiel 16:10
text: I clothed you also with embroidered work, and shod you with sealskin, and I dressed you about with fine linen, and covered you with silk.

name: Ezekiel 16:11
text: I decked you with ornaments, and I put bracelets on your hands, and a chain on your neck.

name: Ezekiel 16:12
text: I put a ring on your nose, and earrings in your ears, and a beautiful crown on your head.

name: Ezekiel 16:13
text: Thus you were decked with gold and silver; and your clothing was of fine linen, and silk, and embroidered work; you ate fine flour, and honey, and oil; and you were exceeding beautiful, and you prospered to royal estate.

name: Ezekiel 16:14
text: Your renown went forth among the nations for your beauty; for it was perfect, through my majesty which I had put on you, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 16:15
text: But you trusted in your beauty, and played the prostitute because of your renown, and poured out your prostitution on everyone who passed by; his it was.

name: Ezekiel 16:16
text: You took of your garments, and made for yourselves high places decked with various colors, and played the prostitute on them: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

name: Ezekiel 16:17
text: You also took your beautiful jewels of my gold and of my silver, which I had given you, and made for yourself images of men, and played the prostitute with them;

name: Ezekiel 16:18
text: and you took your embroidered garments, and covered them, and set my oil and my incense before them.

name: Ezekiel 16:19
text: My bread also which I gave you, fine flour, and oil, and honey, with which I fed you, you even set it before them for a pleasant aroma; and thus it was, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 16:20
text: Moreover you have taken your sons and your daughters, whom you have borne to me, and you have sacrificed these to them to be devoured. Was your prostitution a small matter,

name: Ezekiel 16:21
text: that you have slain my children, and delivered them up, in causing them to pass through the fire to them?

name: Ezekiel 16:22
text: In all your abominations and your prostitution you have not remembered the days of your youth, when you were naked and bare, and were wallowing in your blood.

name: Ezekiel 16:23
text: It has happened after all your wickedness, (woe, woe to you! says the Lord Yahweh),

name: Ezekiel 16:24
text: that you have built for yourselves a vaulted place, and have made yourselves a lofty place in every street.

name: Ezekiel 16:25
text: You have built your lofty place at the head of every way, and have made your beauty an abomination, and have opened your feet to everyone who passed by, and multiplied your prostitution.

name: Ezekiel 16:26
text: You have also committed sexual immorality with the Egyptians, your neighbors, great of flesh; and have multiplied your prostitution, to provoke me to anger.

name: Ezekiel 16:27
text: See therefore, I have stretched out my hand over you, and have diminished your ordinary food, and delivered you to the will of those who hate you, the daughters of the Philistines, who are ashamed of your lewd way.

name: Ezekiel 16:28
text: You have played the prostitute also with the Assyrians, because you were insatiable; yes, you have played the prostitute with them, and yet you weren"t satisfied.

name: Ezekiel 16:29
text: You have moreover multiplied your prostitution to the land of merchants, to Chaldea; and yet you weren"t satisfied with this.

name: Ezekiel 16:30
text: How weak is your heart, says the Lord Yahweh, since you do all these things, the work of an impudent prostitute;

name: Ezekiel 16:31
text: in that you build your vaulted place at the head of every way, and make your lofty place in every street, and have not been as a prostitute, in that you scorn pay.

name: Ezekiel 16:32
text: A wife who commits adultery! who takes strangers instead of her husband!

name: Ezekiel 16:33
text: They give gifts to all prostitutes; but you give your gifts to all your lovers, and bribe them, that they may come to you on every side for your prostitution.

name: Ezekiel 16:34
text: You are different from other women in your prostitution, in that no one follows you to play the prostitute; and whereas you give hire, and no hire is given to you, therefore you are different.

name: Ezekiel 16:35
text: Therefore, prostitute, hear the word of Yahweh:

name: Ezekiel 16:36
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh, Because your filthiness was poured out, and your nakedness uncovered through your prostitution with your lovers; and because of all the idols of your abominations, and for the blood of your children, that you gave to them;

name: Ezekiel 16:37
text: therefore see, I will gather all your lovers, with whom you have taken pleasure, and all those who you have loved, with all those who you have hated; I will even gather them against you on every side, and will uncover your nakedness to them, that they may see all your nakedness.

name: Ezekiel 16:38
text: I will judge you, as women who break wedlock and shed blood are judged; and I will bring on you the blood of wrath and jealousy.

name: Ezekiel 16:39
text: I will also give you into their hand, and they shall throw down your vaulted place, and break down your lofty places; and they shall strip you of your clothes, and take your beautiful jewels; and they shall leave you naked and bare.

name: Ezekiel 16:40
text: They shall also bring up a company against you, and they shall stone you with stones, and thrust you through with their swords.

name: Ezekiel 16:41
text: They shall burn your houses with fire, and execute judgments on you in the sight of many women; and I will cause you to cease from playing the prostitute, and you shall also give no hire any more.

name: Ezekiel 16:42
text: So will I cause my wrath toward you to rest, and my jealousy shall depart from you, and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry.

name: Ezekiel 16:43
text: Because you have not remembered the days of your youth, but have raged against me in all these things; therefore, behold, I also will bring your way on your head, says the Lord Yahweh: and you shall not commit this lewdness with all your abominations.

name: Ezekiel 16:44
text: Behold, everyone who uses proverbs shall use this proverb against you, saying, As is the mother, so is her daughter.

name: Ezekiel 16:45
text: You are the daughter of your mother, who loathes her husband and her children; and you are the sister of your sisters, who loathed their husbands and their children: your mother was a Hittite, and your father an Amorite.

name: Ezekiel 16:46
text: Your elder sister is Samaria, who dwells at your left hand, she and her daughters; and your younger sister, who dwells at your right hand, is Sodom and her daughters.

name: Ezekiel 16:47
text: Yet have you not walked in their ways, nor done after their abominations; but, as if that were a very little thing, you were more corrupt than they in all your ways.

name: Ezekiel 16:48
text: As I live, says the Lord Yahweh, Sodom your sister has not done, she nor her daughters, as you have done, you and your daughters.

name: Ezekiel 16:49
text: Behold, this was the iniquity of your sister Sodom: pride, fullness of bread, and prosperous ease was in her and in her daughters; neither did she strengthen the hand of the poor and needy.

name: Ezekiel 16:50
text: They were haughty, and committed abomination before me: therefore I took them away as I saw good.

name: Ezekiel 16:51
text: Neither has Samaria committed half of your sins; but you have multiplied your abominations more than they, and have justified your sisters by all your abominations which you have done.

name: Ezekiel 16:52
text: You also, bear you your own shame, in that you have given judgment for your sisters; through your sins that you have committed more abominable than they, they are more righteous that you: yes, be also confounded, and bear your shame, in that you have justified your sisters.

name: Ezekiel 16:53
text: I will turn again their captivity, the captivity of Sodom and her daughters, and the captivity of Samaria and her daughters, and the captivity of your captives in their midst;

name: Ezekiel 16:54
text: that you may bear your own shame, and may be ashamed because of all that you have done, in that you are a comfort to them.

name: Ezekiel 16:55
text: Your sisters, Sodom and her daughters, shall return to their former estate; and Samaria and her daughters shall return to their former estate; and you and your daughters shall return to your former estate.

name: Ezekiel 16:56
text: For your sister Sodom was not mentioned by your mouth in the day of your pride,

name: Ezekiel 16:57
text: before your wickedness was uncovered, as at the time of the reproach of the daughters of Syria, and of all who are around her, the daughters of the Philistines, who do despite to you all around.

name: Ezekiel 16:58
text: You have borne your lewdness and your abominations, says Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 16:59
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will also deal with you as you have done, who have despised the oath in breaking the covenant.

name: Ezekiel 16:60
text: Nevertheless I will remember my covenant with you in the days of your youth, and I will establish to you an everlasting covenant.

name: Ezekiel 16:61
text: Then you shall remember your ways, and be ashamed, when you shall receive your sisters, your elder sisters and your younger; and I will give them to you for daughters, but not by your covenant.

name: Ezekiel 16:62
text: I will establish my covenant with you; and you shall know that I am Yahweh;

name: Ezekiel 16:63
text: that you may remember, and be confounded, and never open your mouth any more, because of your shame, when I have forgiven you all that you have done, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 17:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 17:2
text: Son of man, put forth a riddle, and speak a parable to the house of Israel;

name: Ezekiel 17:3
text: and say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: A great eagle with great wings and long feathers, full of feathers, which had various colors, came to Lebanon, and took the top of the cedar:

name: Ezekiel 17:4
text: he cropped off the topmost of the young twigs of it, and carried it to a land of traffic; he set it in a city of merchants.

name: Ezekiel 17:5
text: He took also of the seed of the land, and planted it in a fruitful soil; he placed it beside many waters; he set it as a willow tree.

name: Ezekiel 17:6
text: It grew, and became a spreading vine of low stature, whose branches turned toward him, and its roots were under him: so it became a vine, and brought forth branches, and shot forth sprigs.

name: Ezekiel 17:7
text: There was also another great eagle with great wings and many feathers: and behold, this vine bent its roots toward him, and shot forth its branches toward him, from the beds of its plantation, that he might water it.

name: Ezekiel 17:8
text: It was planted in a good soil by many waters, that it might bring forth branches, and that it might bear fruit, that it might be a goodly vine.

name: Ezekiel 17:9
text: Say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Shall it prosper? shall he not pull up its roots, and cut off its fruit, that it may wither; that all its fresh springing leaves may wither? and not by a strong arm or many people can it be raised from its roots.

name: Ezekiel 17:10
text: Yes, behold, being planted, shall it prosper? shall it not utterly wither, when the east wind touches it? it shall wither in the beds where it grew.

name: Ezekiel 17:11
text: Moreover the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 17:12
text: Say now to the rebellious house, Don"t you know what these things mean? tell them, Behold, the king of Babylon came to Jerusalem, and took its king, and its princes, and brought them to him to Babylon:

name: Ezekiel 17:13
text: and he took of the seed royal, and made a covenant with him; he also brought him under an oath, and took away the mighty of the land;

name: Ezekiel 17:14
text: that the kingdom might be base, that it might not lift itself up, but that by keeping his covenant it might stand.

name: Ezekiel 17:15
text: But he rebelled against him in sending his ambassadors into Egypt, that they might give him horses and many people. Shall he prosper? shall he escape who does such things? shall he break the covenant, and yet escape?

name: Ezekiel 17:16
text: As I live, says the Lord Yahweh, surely in the place where the king dwells who made him king, whose oath he despised, and whose covenant he broke, even with him in the midst of Babylon he shall die.

name: Ezekiel 17:17
text: Neither shall Pharaoh with his mighty army and great company help him in the war, when they cast up mounds and build forts, to cut off many persons.

name: Ezekiel 17:18
text: For he has despised the oath by breaking the covenant; and behold, he had given his hand, and yet has done all these things; he shall not escape.

name: Ezekiel 17:19
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: As I live, surely my oath that he has despised, and my covenant that he has broken, I will even bring it on his own head.

name: Ezekiel 17:20
text: I will spread my net on him, and he shall be taken in my snare, and I will bring him to Babylon, and will enter into judgment with him there for his trespass that he has trespassed against me.

name: Ezekiel 17:21
text: All his fugitives in all his bands shall fall by the sword, and those who remain shall be scattered toward every wind: and you shall know that I, Yahweh, have spoken it.

name: Ezekiel 17:22
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will also take of the lofty top of the cedar, and will set it; I will crop off from the topmost of its young twigs a tender one, and I will plant it on a high and lofty mountain:

name: Ezekiel 17:23
text: in the mountain of the height of Israel will I plant it; and it shall bring forth boughs, and bear fruit, and be a goodly cedar: and under it shall dwell all birds of every wing; in the shade of its branches shall they dwell.

name: Ezekiel 17:24
text: All the trees of the field shall know that I, Yahweh, have brought down the high tree, have exalted the low tree, have dried up the green tree, and have made the dry tree to flourish; I, Yahweh, have spoken and have done it.

name: Ezekiel 18:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me again, saying,

name: Ezekiel 18:2
text: What do you mean, that you use this proverb concerning the land of Israel, saying, The fathers have eaten sour grapes, and the children"s teeth are set on edge?

name: Ezekiel 18:3
text: As I live, says the Lord Yahweh, you shall not have occasion any more to use this proverb in Israel.

name: Ezekiel 18:4
text: Behold, all souls are mine; as the soul of the father, so also the soul of the son is mine: the soul who sins, he shall die.

name: Ezekiel 18:5
text: But if a man is just, and does that which is lawful and right,

name: Ezekiel 18:6
text: and has not eaten on the mountains, neither has lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, neither has defiled his neighbor"s wife, neither has come near to a woman in her impurity,

name: Ezekiel 18:7
text: and has not wronged any, but has restored to the debtor his pledge, has taken nothing by robbery, has given his bread to the hungry, and has covered the naked with a garment;

name: Ezekiel 18:8
text: he who has not given forth on interest, neither has taken any increase, who has withdrawn his hand from iniquity, has executed true justice between man and man,

name: Ezekiel 18:9
text: has walked in my statutes, and has kept my ordinances, to deal truly; he is just, he shall surely live, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 18:10
text: If he fathers a son who is a robber, a shedder of blood, and who does any one of these things,

name: Ezekiel 18:11
text: and who does not any of those duties, but even has eaten on the mountains, and defiled his neighbor"s wife,

name: Ezekiel 18:12
text: has wronged the poor and needy, has taken by robbery, has not restored the pledge, and has lifted up his eyes to the idols, has committed abomination,

name: Ezekiel 18:13
text: has given forth on interest, and has taken increase; shall he then live? he shall not live: he has done all these abominations; he shall surely die; his blood shall be on him.

name: Ezekiel 18:14
text: Now, behold, if he fathers a son, who sees all his father"s sins, which he has done, and fears, and does not such like;

name: Ezekiel 18:15
text: who has not eaten on the mountains, neither has lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, has not defiled his neighbor"s wife,

name: Ezekiel 18:16
text: neither has wronged any, has not taken anything to pledge, neither has taken by robbery, but has given his bread to the hungry, and has covered the naked with a garment;

name: Ezekiel 18:17
text: who has withdrawn his hand from the poor, who has not received interest nor increase, has executed my ordinances, has walked in my statutes; he shall not die for the iniquity of his father, he shall surely live.

name: Ezekiel 18:18
text: As for his father, because he cruelly oppressed, robbed his brother, and did that which is not good among his people, behold, he shall die in his iniquity.

name: Ezekiel 18:19
text: Yet you say, Why doesn"t the son bear the iniquity of the father? When the son has done that which is lawful and right, and has kept all my statutes, and has done them, he shall surely live.

name: Ezekiel 18:20
text: The soul who sins, he shall die: the son shall not bear the iniquity of the father, neither shall the father bear the iniquity of the son; the righteousness of the righteous shall be on him, and the wickedness of the wicked shall be on him.

name: Ezekiel 18:21
text: But if the wicked turn from all his sins that he has committed, and keep all my statutes, and do that which is lawful and right, he shall surely live, he shall not die.

name: Ezekiel 18:22
text: None of his transgressions that he has committed shall be remembered against him: in his righteousness that he has done he shall live.

name: Ezekiel 18:23
text: Have I any pleasure in the death of the wicked? says the Lord Yahweh; and not rather that he should return from his way, and live?

name: Ezekiel 18:24
text: But when the righteous turns away from his righteousness, and commits iniquity, and does according to all the abominations that the wicked man does, shall he live? None of his righteous deeds that he has done shall be remembered: in his trespass that he has trespassed, and in his sin that he has sinned, in them shall he die.

name: Ezekiel 18:25
text: Yet you say, The way of the Lord is not equal. Hear now, house of Israel: Is my way not equal? Aren"t your ways unequal?

name: Ezekiel 18:26
text: When the righteous man turns away from his righteousness, and commits iniquity, and dies therein; in his iniquity that he has done shall he die.

name: Ezekiel 18:27
text: Again, when the wicked man turns away from his wickedness that he has committed, and does that which is lawful and right, he shall save his soul alive.

name: Ezekiel 18:28
text: Because he considers, and turns away from all his transgressions that he has committed, he shall surely live, he shall not die.

name: Ezekiel 18:29
text: Yet the house of Israel says, "The way of the Lord is not fair." House of Israel, aren"t my ways fair? Aren"t your ways unfair?

name: Ezekiel 18:30
text: Therefore I will judge you, house of Israel, everyone according to his ways, says the Lord Yahweh. Return, and turn yourselves from all your transgressions; so iniquity shall not be your ruin.

name: Ezekiel 18:31
text: Cast away from you all your transgressions, in which you have transgressed; and make yourself a new heart and a new spirit: for why will you die, house of Israel?

name: Ezekiel 18:32
text: For I have no pleasure in the death of him who dies, says the Lord Yahweh: therefore turn yourselves, and live.

name: Ezekiel 19:1
text: Moreover, take up a lamentation for the princes of Israel,

name: Ezekiel 19:2
text: and say, What was your mother? A lioness: she couched among lions, in the midst of the young lions she nourished her cubs.

name: Ezekiel 19:3
text: She brought up one of her cubs: he became a young lion, and he learned to catch the prey; he devoured men.

name: Ezekiel 19:4
text: The nations also heard of him; he was taken in their pit; and they brought him with hooks to the land of Egypt.

name: Ezekiel 19:5
text: Now when she saw that she had waited, and her hope was lost, then she took another of her cubs, and made him a young lion.

name: Ezekiel 19:6
text: He went up and down among the lions; he became a young lion, and he learned to catch the prey; he devoured men.

name: Ezekiel 19:7
text: He knew their palaces, and laid waste their cities; and the land was desolate, and its fullness, because of the noise of his roaring.

name: Ezekiel 19:8
text: Then the nations set against him on every side from the provinces; and they spread their net over him; he was taken in their pit.

name: Ezekiel 19:9
text: They put him in a cage with hooks, and brought him to the king of Babylon; they brought him into strongholds, that his voice should no more be heard on the mountains of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 19:10
text: Your mother was like a vine, in your blood, planted by the waters: it was fruitful and full of branches by reason of many waters.

name: Ezekiel 19:11
text: It had strong rods for the scepters of those who bore rule, and their stature was exalted among the thick boughs, and they were seen in their height with the multitude of their branches.

name: Ezekiel 19:12
text: But it was plucked up in fury, it was cast down to the ground, and the east wind dried up its fruit: its strong rods were broken off and withered; the fire consumed them.

name: Ezekiel 19:13
text: Now it is planted in the wilderness, in a dry and thirsty land.

name: Ezekiel 19:14
text: Fire is gone out of the rods of its branches, it has devoured its fruit, so that there is in it no strong rod to be a scepter to rule. This is a lamentation, and shall be for a lamentation.

name: Ezekiel 20:1
text: It happened in the seventh year, in the fifth month, the tenth day of the month, that certain of the elders of Israel came to inquire of Yahweh, and sat before me.

name: Ezekiel 20:2
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 20:3
text: Son of man, speak to the elders of Israel, and tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Is it to inquire of me that you have come? As I live, says the Lord Yahweh, I will not be inquired of by you.

name: Ezekiel 20:4
text: Will you judge them, son of man, will you judge them? Cause them to know the abominations of their fathers;

name: Ezekiel 20:5
text: and tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: In the day when I chose Israel, and swore to the seed of the house of Jacob, and made myself known to them in the land of Egypt, when I swore to them, saying, I am Yahweh your God;

name: Ezekiel 20:6
text: in that day I swore to them, to bring them forth out of the land of Egypt into a land that I had searched out for them, flowing with milk and honey, which is the glory of all lands.

name: Ezekiel 20:7
text: I said to them, Cast away every man the abominations of his eyes, and don"t defile yourselves with the idols of Egypt; I am Yahweh your God.

name: Ezekiel 20:8
text: But they rebelled against me, and would not listen to me; they each didn"t throw away the abominations of their eyes, neither did they forsake the idols of Egypt. Then I said I would pour out my wrath on them, to accomplish my anger against them in the midst of the land of Egypt.

name: Ezekiel 20:9
text: But I worked for my name"s sake, that it should not be profaned in the sight of the nations, among which they were, in whose sight I made myself known to them, in bringing them forth out of the land of Egypt.

name: Ezekiel 20:10
text: So I caused them to go forth out of the land of Egypt, and brought them into the wilderness.

name: Ezekiel 20:11
text: I gave them my statutes, and showed them my ordinances, which if a man does, he shall live in them.

name: Ezekiel 20:12
text: Moreover also I gave them my Sabbaths, to be a sign between me and them, that they might know that I am Yahweh who sanctifies them.

name: Ezekiel 20:13
text: But the house of Israel rebelled against me in the wilderness: they didn"t walk in my statutes, and they rejected my ordinances, which if a man keep, he shall live in them; and my Sabbaths they greatly profaned. Then I said I would pour out my wrath on them in the wilderness, to consume them.

name: Ezekiel 20:14
text: But I worked for my name"s sake, that it should not be profaned in the sight of the nations, in whose sight I brought them out.

name: Ezekiel 20:15
text: Moreover also I swore to them in the wilderness, that I would not bring them into the land which I had given them, flowing with milk and honey, which is the glory of all lands;

name: Ezekiel 20:16
text: because they rejected my ordinances, and didn"t walk in my statutes, and profaned my Sabbaths: for their heart went after their idols.

name: Ezekiel 20:17
text: Nevertheless my eye spared them, and I didn"t destroy them, neither did I make a full end of them in the wilderness.

name: Ezekiel 20:18
text: I said to their children in the wilderness, Don"t walk in the statutes of your fathers, neither observe their ordinances, nor defile yourselves with their idols.

name: Ezekiel 20:19
text: I am Yahweh your God: walk in my statutes, and keep my ordinances, and do them;

name: Ezekiel 20:20
text: and make my Sabbaths holy; and they shall be a sign between me and you, that you may know that I am Yahweh your God.

name: Ezekiel 20:21
text: But the children rebelled against me; they didn"t walk in my statutes, neither kept my ordinances to do them, which if a man do, he shall live in them; they profaned my Sabbaths. Then I said I would pour out my wrath on them, to accomplish my anger against them in the wilderness.

name: Ezekiel 20:22
text: Nevertheless I withdrew my hand, and worked for my name"s sake, that it should not be profaned in the sight of the nations, in whose sight I brought them forth.

name: Ezekiel 20:23
text: Moreover I swore to them in the wilderness, that I would scatter them among the nations, and disperse them through the countries;

name: Ezekiel 20:24
text: because they had not executed my ordinances, but had rejected my statutes, and had profaned my Sabbaths, and their eyes were after their fathers" idols.

name: Ezekiel 20:25
text: Moreover also I gave them statutes that were not good, and ordinances in which they should not live;

name: Ezekiel 20:26
text: and I polluted them in their own gifts, in that they caused to pass through the fire all that opens the womb, that I might make them desolate, to the end that they might know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 20:27
text: Therefore, son of man, speak to the house of Israel, and tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: In this moreover have your fathers blasphemed me, in that they have committed a trespass against me.

name: Ezekiel 20:28
